nodes.text: Rhinnal was a cold planet which was a member of the Galactic Republic during the High Republic Era. Considered a key world of the Republic, Rhinnal received a floating island with a replication of its environment at the Republic Fair on Valo. Since Valo was considerably warmer than Rhinnal, Jedi Master Elzar Mann visited the island to see how its environmental controls were able to maintain the snow on the island despite the heat.
